user.title: Add SmallTV Ultra
user.description: How do you want to find the device?

scan.title: Scan network
scan.description: Enter the first three octets of your subnet (e.g. 192.168.0). The integration will probe all 254 hosts and list any SmallTV Ultra devices it finds.

pick.title: Choose a device
pick.description: The following SmallTV Ultra devices were found on the network:

manual.title: Enter IP address
manual.description: Enter the IP address of your SmallTV Ultra device (e.g. 192.168.0.18).

reconfigure.title: Change SmallTV Ultra IP address
reconfigure.description: Enter the new IP address of your device.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the device. Check the IP address and network.
error.not_smalltv_ultra: The device at that address is not a SmallTV Ultra.
error.no_devices_found: No SmallTV Ultra devices found on that subnet. Check the subnet or enter the IP manually.

data_description.refresh_interval: How often HA uploads new images to the device (minimum 60s).
data_description.cycle_interval: How fast the device cycles through camera frames in the GIF.
